title: Ancient Automata and Mechanical Dreams
description: A 60-second lesson on Ancient Automata and Mechanical Dreams.

hook.text: In 250 BC, a Greek engineer built a mechanical pigeon that could fly. AI dreams are ancient.

buildup.text: For millennia, humans imagined machines that could think, move, and decide.

discovery.text: Hero of Alexandria built programmable devices. Al-Jazari created automaton musicians in 1206.

climax.text: Every AI researcher today stands on a lineage stretching back thousands of years.

punchline.text: The dream of artificial minds is older than science.
